name: kwick/kiwibox Widescreen
description:
NO LONGER MAINTAINED

kwick.de community changed its design, this fix makes the start page easier to use on widescreen monitors.

Does NOT affect ads and (hopefully) other parts of the sites FOR NOW.

Now also works for kiwibox.com

v0.2
additional_info: Tested in 2560x1440 and 1920x1080/1200 on Firefox Developer Edition and Google Chrome 46
